navigation
Class PathFinder

java.lang.Object
  navigation.PathFinder

public class PathFinder
extends java.lang.Object

This finds a path based on the Nodes determined in the map TODO: Internal implementation of A* uses Euclidean distance, might be better to override and use Manhattan distance to get the least amount of turns possible

Author:
Peter Henderson
